translations: v．使高兴，使欣喜：使某人感到愉快或满足。
· The news of their success gladdens my heart.
他们成功的消息让我心情愉快。

sentences.sentence: Here air very is also good, some one kind gladdens the heart feeling.
sentences.translation: 这里的空气也很好，有一种沁人心脾的感觉。

sentences.sentence: It gladdens my heart and soul much more than mere words typed upon a page could ever possibly express.
sentences.translation: 它尤其令人高兴，我的心脏和灵魂，远不止仅仅是打字的话后，一个网页可以永远不可能表达的。

sentences.sentence: I learn a lot about them and it gladdens me that they spend time with the Lord, even by merely speaking His name.
sentences.translation: 我学到许多，他们高兴和我说，他们花时间与上帝，即使只是讲他的名字。
